answers.answer: I dont have any help but I get chills too just not that often. Hope someone can help you. But id maybe call your doctor to see if they want you to come in
Thank you! I guess ill give them a call. My appt is This thursday but idk if i should wait that long. Its really bugging me. :/
It wont hurt to call. You never know they may want you to come in earlier.I would have seen your question earlier but my app decided it wanted to screw up.

question: 18 weeks tomorrow. 3rd baby. I feel fine but Since yesterday, ive been getting the chills A LOT. Im talking like every 20 mins lasting about 2 secs. I know pregnancy causing temp fluctuations but idk if this often is normal? Its beginning to bother me because it wont stop. Should I be concerned, i feel that something isnt right and my body is reacting to a certain problem? :/ plz help ive unfortunately googled this and got bad reviews of course from infection to preeclampsia. Help anyone
title: EXCESSIVE CHILLS?!
